Notes: See `Yale <https://e360.yale.edu/features/scientists-probe-the-surprising-role-of-trees-in-methane-emissions>`_ or `Nature <https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-019-00122-z>`_ for more information on methane emissions from forests.

Information: Annual average :math:`\text{CO}_2` emitted mass of dry matter burned due to forest fires (≥ 0)
Notes: Forest fires are represented in the land use transition matrix as part of ``$CAT-FOREST$`` to the class ``other``. Reductions in this transition can represent reductions in forest fires.

Variable: Average Fraction of Forest Burned Annually

Variable: Fire Biomass Consumption for Tropical Forests
